website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality soaker allows users to enjoy the extra-large design for many years to come.
pros: Extra-long sliding runway works well for teenagers and adults
Built-in sprinkler system runs along the edge of the slide
Customers appreciated its thick and durable construction
cons: Many wish the slide was longer for the expensive price
Rather heavy, and difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Mixed emotions
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it’s much better quality compared to the cheap $15 slip n slides, but I was expecting SOOOOO much more at 10 times the cost!!! It’s WAY shorter than I expected. We ended up adding a cheap slip n slide and other tarps to the ends to make it 3 times the length and admittedly the kids loved it. So, now I feel compelled to buy at least one more wow slide to add to the first to save us some effort. But I’m not thrilled about spending over $300 on them and I’m not sure they are worth it. I guess I’m just a sucker for my kid!!
customer_reviews.author: Pollywannabuya

customer_reviews.title: The wow slip and slide was the Hit of the 6th and 7th grade retreat
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these 25’ and It was the highlight of the weekend! We had a blast! It held up perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Don Lepard

customer_reviews.title: Not slippery at all!
customer_reviews.text: We really hate to write this review, but our first try using this was a total bust. Just as one person posted on here, it isn't slick at all. We put it facing down a hill and everything! Kids ran at it and slid on the provided mats.....then nothing. They didn't slide an inch. I gave it a two as we didn't try for too long as my kids got bored and cold. So I will edit my review if things somehow get better with one more try. If it ends up not being any better, we are returning it! Now we just need a warm day to give it another shot....
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very fun Party slide!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a birthday party for my 34 year old daughters. Quick and Easy set up. My daughters, their husbands and all my grandchildren had a blast. Even Gigi and Pops tried out the super slide. The toddlers played in the water being sprayed along the slide. Others worked on their slide technique. Held up great. Was a mention of buying a second one to add to the length. Looking forward to the next party. a great price for a sturdy water toy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Gresser

customer_reviews.title: Leaking water around the hose connection.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this 3 times with little kids (ages 4 & 6) and the place where the hose connects to the slide is loosened and leaking a lot of water. I can’t seem to find how to contact the company. Wish it came with a fortified hose connector.
customer_reviews.author: HealthLover

customer_reviews.title: It is best if you use the inflatable rafts to slide
customer_reviews.text: first use, the connector to use the garden hose broke off.... we had to use the hose by just spraying it down the slide. It is best if you use the inflatable rafts to slide. but the bumper side rails are easy to inflate and keep that water moving down the slide. Plus it is a wide area so it was a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: lemajor

customer_reviews.title: Terrific quality
customer_reviews.text: Great slide of heavy gauge vinyl. Made for a memorable afternoon with smiles and laughter. I expect lots of fun filled summer days thanks to this slide- a great way to beat the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost.  This is so fun!
customer_reviews.text: Handled the first summer terrifically. We had 5 children (6 and under) on it at one time. This slide handled a 245 pound man without issue. This is not the slip and slide from my childhood it is a thousand times better! This certainly costs more too but if it holds up for multiple summers then it’s a good value.
customer_reviews.author: NWSwallow

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun! My grandchildren loved it. There is a weight limit of 110 lbs, but my son and I both used it. The water tends to puddle at the bottom, which my grandchildren really loved. My yard was pretty soggy when we where finished. My yard is super green and the grass is growing like crazy. We had races going down at the same time. Warning Super slippery, my grandson and I each fell and busted bootie trying to get on the float, but that didn’t stop our fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!!!! Fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is boss!!! My niece and nephew love this thing (and it’s fun for grown ups ;) ). This slide is durable and reliable I have it almost a year with zero issues It’s a bit pricey but a lot better than standard slip and slides A couple of tips though Go to Walmart and buy a cheap air mattress blow up electric pump And get 8 tent anchors to anchor the straps down
customer_reviews.author: Gary  B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice for kid parties and its still in great shape. If your yard has a slight slope its even better. I think its worth spending a bit more to have this slip and slide. I was debating it before I purchased this one, but I made a good decision.
customer_reviews.author: DANA PRATO

customer_reviews.title: definitely not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in July, photo taken 2 months later.. product was brittle which caused multiple holes and tears to the point where the slide was no longer usable (only on white sliding surface) red vinyl held air and had no issues. This was a very expensive item for only 2 months use!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Greiner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is as described and super slippery. DO NOT ever try to walk on it and warn kids not to, its slippery as ice! Anyway, you will need an electric inflator and should but cheap pool floats as extra for the slide, we have a binch and kids like variety. A little slope is needed too to get up to speed. Plastic is thick and seems durable. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought an 18’ slip n’ slide type thing a few days before we got this... The cheap one was $30 and it is SO LAME when compared to this one!!!! My kids also LOVE the 2 inflatable “sleds” that come with this, so they don’t have to wait for the other person to come back with it, they can just go one after the other!! This is worth every penny!!! Now I think I might get a second one since they can also connect!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hussey

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t wait to give this as a birthday gift for my twin grandsons. After using the slip & slide several times, the two “boogies” that came with it constantly deflate and are no no use! VERY DISAPPOINTED!!! Please contact me regarding this issue!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: The slide is built to last, with very high quality PVC and connectors/components. It was very easy and quick to set up (~20 minutes), and performed flawlessly during use with adults. Will give it a longer test soon and update the review if any issues arise, but wholly expect none to come up. Very well made slide.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: This was fun when it lasted, but it only lasted a few times. The connection site for the hose is very thin and the plastic inside part is sharp and penetrated the side wall. The water leaks all around the hose input. We tried to patch it but it doesn’t work. We are disappointed because there is no way to fix it. Also, the slide we purchased looks different than pictured here. The covering around the water input is not as thick.
customer_reviews.author: C. roth

customer_reviews.title: Popped sled
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but the blow up sled popped on the second use. I wrote a letter to the seller but they ignored me and I have no other way of getting in contact with them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slip n slide
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Air pump came cracked. WOW replaced at no charge. Great quality and large for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a BBQ we host for our church worship team every year, it was a hit with the kids and fun to watch them play. we added a little tear free baby soap to the sleds for an extra slippery ride. I will buy another one to attach to it and put on our hill for next years BBQ. SO worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if I would buy again....
customer_reviews.text: The slide is certainly durable, and good quality. However, it was missing pieces (we had to take stakes from our tent to secure the slide for our daughter's birthday party. Only two stakes were in the packaging. At least six are needed to properly secure it.) And, as other commenters have noted, for the price point, the slide is really short. I'm not sure I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MG323

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Have but a couple of the Banzai at Home Depot or Menards and you can barely get a short Chicago summer out of them for as much as $60. I think this is one of the "you get what you pay for situations". Looks and feels well built. My 7 and 10 yr olds love it. Only downside so far? Up until delivery, I was unaware it was Made in China. Update: ordered a second one to connect, connections were different so was unable to do so. Still great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Six year old boy happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Six year old son loves this. The bumpers are nice, less worry he is going to slide off into the grass. Made of durable material. Husband said it was a pain to inflate, even with the included tool, so it's going to stay inflated all summer, not just when in use, so we will see how durable it is out in the hot sun all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleds loose air in same place
customer_reviews.text: This is our second slide as it is much more durable than the cheaper versions, but for the price you would expect that. This time both sleds have started leaking right in the same spot and you can't order just the sleds. How can I have them replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Grammy4

customer_reviews.title: Was Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: So Glad I bought two of these! They can be connected and makes for a GREAT family day! tip: don't cut your grass before using! there was grass all over everyone and the slide the first time we used it!
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good product but price has raised alot since last year
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good product. but dang i only paid $169.00 last summer for this. Could it be that they raised the price because of the pandemic?
customer_reviews.author: ManderPanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👌
customer_reviews.text: When I tell I was pretty impressed by these slide. It's long enough my Kid had a blast on his birthday. The only thing the water doesn't spray as strong but I put some soap and more water it works amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice and worth it! Heavy duty and water sprays entire length of pontoon! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This slip and slide is worth the money! It’s durable heavy plastic with stakes for sturdy and secure placement! The pontoons are inflated (pump not included; used cordless from air mattress) and one pontoon has hose connected so water sprays out gently the entire length of the slide! The 2’x3’ inflatable rafts make sliding fun and painless!!!! Heavy duty and durable so plan to use for couple three summers and maybe add one to it!
customer_reviews.author: HollyM

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The durability, quality and usefulness of this is excellent. I’ve had my 3 kids playing on it every few days all summer
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Slide gives a fast ride.
customer_reviews.text: The mat has a bumper on each side which helps keep you from sliding off. The sleds that come with the mat allow for a pretty fast ride. One of the sleds had a hole and is being replaced by the company. Customer service was good. You definitely need a pump to blow up the mat and sleds.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stickles

customer_reviews.title: Great if it worked
customer_reviews.text: Rip in one of the sleds within a few minutes. Way shorter than the pics lead you to believe.
customer_reviews.author: ESM

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun! If you know how to take it down after
customer_reviews.text: I liked this a lot. The negative about it is it’s actually rather difficult to put away. I can seem to figure out how to deflate the sides well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Saba Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough for $200
customer_reviews.text: Both slides broke within the first week of owning this, they were extremely cheap. Now 2 months in, a side bumper has a hole. Definitely not what I would expect with a $200 slide. I will gladly update this review if the manufacturer steps up and sends me a new slide. That’s just good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Reese

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot summer day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this originally to teach my 11 year old how to slide for baseball but now it is fan favorite in our neighborhood. Have had 100 kids on it this summer and it is great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons have had a blast with this. Having to stay close to home all summer, they have spent a lot of time outside playing together on it and they love this waterslide.
customer_reviews.author: Joyee

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the fun, 3 stars for the blow-up float/slides. The kids LOVE this. It's easy to set up and works great. The 2 small floats that came with it are pretty much useless. One got a hole in it after the first use and the second got a hole in it after the 2nd use. It did come with a patch kit, but I'm not going to bother. It's still a lot of fun for the kids to use even without them and you can use any other small pool floats on it if you want.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vittengl

customer_reviews.title: Great slide, heavy duty and terrific for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great slide, heavy duty and terrific for kids. My husband and I used it too. I love how long the slide is, we created a pool at the end to splash into. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Hose attachment broken at arrival
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks after placing our order we were so excited when it arrived! Upon opening we realized that the sides required a special attachment air pump that none of ours had. Then we noticed that the main attachment for the hose was not fully fused to the slip and slide causing water to just pour out and around the attachment. For the price of this item I expected more. Poor quality or a defect that was missed prior to shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Kids (9&5) love the slide and it’s easy to put out and take down. Only complaint is that one of the sleds popped on the 1st or 2nd day. Tried to patch but it looks like a bad seam. -update - let the company know about the issue and they sent me 2 new sleds to replace. BRAVO, thanks and recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this being worth the $. But it totally is. Kids love it! They did manage to pop one of the sleds but the slide is heavy duty plastic. Like a pool liner
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: One is tough and good for little kids. But you can put 10 together and launch into a lake.
customer_reviews.text: We had it on a small hill and it worked great and not to fast for the little kids. The adult kids enjoyed it also. We plan on buying two more because each one interlocks to make a longer slide. We have a bigger hill and the adults realize this is not just a kids toy. Material is thick and tough. It’s going to be wicked fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Heath

customer_reviews.title: Decent slide, but the stakes are too small.
customer_reviews.text: The original product was defective and had to be replaced because it had holes in it. When the replacement came, I immediately discovered that the stakes that came with it were far too small to work. I ordered replacement stakes that were much larger and actually work (shown in the picture). Other than that, the slide works well.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley A. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So much fun for all. We are going to buy another one to connect it to. Only drawback, once the ground gets really wet, the spikes that come with the slide cannot stay in the ground. This causes the water to spray straight down instead of across.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great slide
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last summer and it has worked great kids are still sliding on it of course you have to take care of it but this is a great slide kids are having a fantastic time on it
customer_reviews.author: Vicky C.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was much better quality than I thought. Very easy to set up. I ended up buying an electric pump but the hand pump that comes with it does pretty well actually. I will be buying a second one to connect them. I would give this slide a perfect 5 stars but I believe a couple extra stake straps should be added near to the access laying plastic near the ‘start’. This does get bunches up a little bit, not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Fun water toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun water toy for the backyard. My grandchildren, who range from 3-12, all enjoy it. The extra “sleds” really add to the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Windy City Muse

customer_reviews.title: Slippery fun!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and slippery! 9 year olds loved this! Does tear up the yard but hey... you’re only little once 😍 They could’ve played on this all day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was lots of fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it. It was easy to setup and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, better than any other one we’ve tried. Beware: all the neighborhood kids will be coming over.
customer_reviews.author: Cold Zero

customer_reviews.title: Slip n slide is great, but the sleds didn't inflate.
customer_reviews.text: We used the side for the first time this weekend. Both Sleds had holes in the seams and wouldn't inflate.
customer_reviews.author: katieclark625

customer_reviews.title: Durable large water slide
customer_reviews.text: This slide was a birthday gift for 3 rough boys! We had lots of friends over to celebrate and everyone had soooo much fun! It held up great and is easy to pack away for winter. Our only regret was that we didn’t buy two to connect them! So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Sled Quality Poor
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box - first time using and one of the inflatable sleds has a leak in it and won’t stay inflated! Horrible quality and too hard to pack up and ship back now!
customer_reviews.author: YP

customer_reviews.title: Missing items.
customer_reviews.text: Did not have floats or pump. I thought O purchased the one specifically that had pump but I am ok with that because I must have read it wrong . I know the floats are supposed to come with it is. Was not in original box. Had to buy floats at store to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Ward

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this slide for Memorial Day Party and it was a hit. It was easy to set up survived group of crazy kids and even some adults...lol
customer_reviews.author: Stadenka

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Was not on legs as shown in picture and one of the sleds bursted at the seams in three days. I do not feel the cost equals the value of the product.
customer_reviews.author: TS Maupin

customer_reviews.title: Not functioning
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return the product because it is not working well. The first time we used it, we had to put it up a hill because the water was not coming out on the side to help with the slide. The second time we used it on a Flat surface and still an issue. My kids gave up after 15min of play. Not sure if the product is defective but would like to return for a refund if possible.
customer_reviews.author: juide-marie sarabosing

customer_reviews.title: Buy longer stakes.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. They only problem was that the stakes weren't long enough. Went to Home Depot and was able to get nice long ones.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: With pools closed we purchased a Water Slide for our family vacation in Oregon. The kids immediately set it up and played on it daily. It was strong and has held up well. Water continues to run as long as the hose is turned on. As Grandparents we hit a homerun bring this on the trip for the grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Pat@Schlunt.com

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This slip and slide is high quality and very durable. I paid the extra money and has been worth it. The little slip and slides that you get from Walmart rip after 1st use. I have had this one for over a year now and the kids continuously play on it. The only con I have is it is heavier than the other kinds but it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bane

customer_reviews.title: Great home activity
customer_reviews.text: Awesome idea for home outdoor water play especially in these times
customer_reviews.author: Misskey

customer_reviews.title: Great slide, poor rafts
customer_reviews.text: Love this slide. Slide itself is very durable but the rafts popped the first and second day of use. I understand if my yard was poor quality rafts would pop but my grass is well grown and not sure how the rafts popped so quickly. Trying to figure out how to buy more rafts.
customer_reviews.author: Amie S

customer_reviews.title: Thick material
customer_reviews.text: Our yard doesn’t have good grass and has lots of little sticks and pieces of pine cone. This works great! Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy but well built. It's long enough but you'd need to make sure your yard is large enough.
customer_reviews.author: Y.L. Yin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 yr daughter, but all ages can have a blast on this slip-n-slide. I love this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product is highly over rated and priced. I am not one to normally leave a review let alone a negative review however for the cost of this slide the quality is not comparable. The slide is completely faded after just a few uses and does not look anything like the pictures. Product is not what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: J Curry

customer_reviews.title: Use the rafts it’s a really nice slip and slide
customer_reviews.text: It is so fun at first I didn’t use the rafts but then I realized I go faster with Rafes
customer_reviews.author: Christa Cole

customer_reviews.title: Quality control
customer_reviews.text: Good slide, but the hose attachment is very weak broke on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: hernan

customer_reviews.title: Helps beat the heat
customer_reviews.text: There is hooks for attachments. I would like to find something like a kiddie pool attachment for the end to catch you. The stakes broke on 2nd use. Need to buy more durable tent stakes to hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this water slide for a birthday party. It was a huge success! This is a substantial water slide! You will need an electric air pump to pump up the sides. There is a hand pump included, but it will take forever to pump it up with that! Overall an awesome water slide!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids (7, 8, 5) loved sliding down the hill on this water slide.
customer_reviews.author: Trayton

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I played on it today. The steaks don’t hold in ground very well
customer_reviews.author: Amie qualls

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $170
customer_reviews.text: The slide is fun but for $170 I wasn’t expecting one of the inflatable slide to come with a hole. That was a disappointment. Also the pegs to secure it in the grass are too short and come out easily; had to get rent stakes to secure it to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pagliasotti

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! Made a little pool at the end by stacking tires and a tarp. I got 2 because 25' is too short but they connect well together, just need a second hose if you want the sprinkler on the second slide.
customer_reviews.author: heile f.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SLIDE /  POOR SLIDER RAFTS
customer_reviews.text: The slip and slide is great. THE TWO JOY RIDER RAFTS THAT CAME WITH THE SLIP AND SLIDE DID NOT HOLD AIR (THEY LEAKED). I SENT THEM BACK TO AMAZON. PLEASE SEND ME REPLACEMENT JOY RIDER RAFTS. IT HAS BEEN TWO WEEKS AND NO RESPONSE FROM AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: stephen dale lukacs

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something that got my son out of the house!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: vernon

customer_reviews.title: Slide is good; rafts are not.
customer_reviews.text: Raft split in two different seams in the first day when used by an average sized six year old. Slide itself seems durable but the rafts leave a lot to be desired for the price of the item.
customer_reviews.author: In GA

customer_reviews.title: Kids loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This slide was much better than expected. Kids absolutely loves it. Good quality product so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: It was very sturdy, durable, and fun! We used it for our 4th of July Party. It was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Goehle

customer_reviews.title: worth spending the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: We've had the various competing products, and this one really stands up to the test! We had a party with 15 x 8 year olds and they used this for 4 hours straight without one issue! fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Everything as advertised!  Fun, Fun, Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Set it up on a slight hill, going into stream at my cabin in Wisconsin. The grandkids (and I) ablsolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: David D. Lester

customer_reviews.title: Best Option on the market
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it’s on the expensive side when it comes to slipnslides but it’s awesome. Best we’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Miller

customer_reviews.title: Really huge. Bought two to put together and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Really huge. Bought two to put together and it is a monster! Only downside, you need an air compressor to fill up the sides with air. The included hand pump would take superman 3 weeks to fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The mats broke during the first use. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Slide
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son very much enjoyed this slide.
customer_reviews.author: MISTY HERRON

customer_reviews.title: Love the
customer_reviews.text: These things are grate I love them so much and we use them every year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: hose connection leaks
customer_reviews.text: The connection spot for the hose squirts out water which is disappointing because this is otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Events!
customer_reviews.text: Our family has loved this and recently bought a 3rd section for 4th of July!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of home made fun!
customer_reviews.text: It was actually better quality than I expected. My grandkids (12 of them) had a wonderful time.
customer_reviews.author: Monica L. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy material. We bought a second one to attach and it was the hit of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Super slide
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return the super slide, my grandkids are too young to use it. I have never taken it out of the box. sorry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much enjoyed.
customer_reviews.text: My son and his friends had a blast playing on the slide.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, just need ways to connect one hose for multiple slides
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is no way to connect one hose to slides of using more than one....
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Masi

product_meta.title: Wow World of Watersports Super Slide
feature_bullets: Zig-zag spray pattern sprinkler system runs the length of the slide for awesome water coverage for great sliding, connects easily to a water hose
Extra-thick, heavy-duty PVC, more than twice as thick as most lawn slides on the market
Super-slick embossed PVC so no need to add soap, 8 inch high side-wall pontoon to keep the sliders and the water on the slide
Comes with two 36"x24" Mega sleds to soften the impact on the ground when sliding and for a more slippery ride

Customized connection system to connect as many slides together as you want, make your own 100-foot slide; Can connect to any of the other WOW 6x25’ Giant slides (Mega Slide, Strike Zone, Super Slide)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
